name: Blue Ice Choucas Pro Harness - Unisex
description: A fully featured, ultralight harness for committing alpine routes, ice climbs, and fast multipitch missions. It weighs about the same as 2 energy bars, and is loaded with gear loops, a haul loop and even a drop seat. The leg loops open fully, so you can put it on or take it off when wearing skis or crampons.UHMW polyethylene and high-tenacity polyester is lightweight yet durable.Breathable mesh in waistbelt and leg loops reduce weight.Waistbelt has standard adjustable buckle.Leg loops have open-able buckle and webbing closure .4 standard gear loops hold all your pro.2 ice screw slots for winter objectives.
